title: Workshop on Utilizing Visual Instructional Design Language for Distance Education Learning Design

context.additional_context: Team-based project execution and summative assessment-centric operations in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can create remote education blueprints with three or more levels using the Visual Instructional Design Language (VIDL)
Learners can design team-based project learning activity sequences using LAMS/CADMOS tools
Learners can propose strategies to induce over 80% learner engagement when designing group activities with role assignments

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Support Manual

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
